name: porridge
description: A simple and hearty breakfast made from oats
instructions: In a pot, combine the oats and milk or water.
Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5-7 minutes until the oats have softened and the porridge has thickened.
Remove from heat and allow it to rest for a minute before serving.
Optionally, add toppings like fruits, nuts, or sweeteners as desired.
